title: travelplanner: Can you assist in developing a 3-day trip plan for two individuals? We'll embark on our journey from San Jose aiming to explore Portland from March 16th to March 18th, 2022. Our budget is limited to $1,000. Our itinerary must include accommodations where pets are allowed. Regarding cuisine, we're particularly interested in Mediterranean, French, Mexican, and Indian food. Importantly, please avoid any flight bookings for transportation. (b578e3e08ef2f3cb)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

chat_history.content: Can you assist in developing a 3-day trip plan for two individuals? We'll embark on our journey from San Jose aiming to explore Portland from March 16th to March 18th, 2022. Our budget is limited to $1,000. Our itinerary must include accommodations where pets are allowed. Regarding cuisine, we're particularly interested in Mediterranean, French, Mexican, and Indian food. Importantly, please avoid any flight bookings for transportation.

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions":"Find transportation options from San Jose to Portland that do not involve flights, such as buses or trains, for March 16th, 2022."}

chat_history.content:
I currently don't have the capability to search for bus or train schedules directly. However, I can guide you on how to find this information:

1. **Bus Options:**
   - **Greyhound:** Visit the [Greyhound website](https://www.greyhound.com) and search for routes from San Jose to Portland.
   - **Megabus:** Check the [Megabus website](https://www.megabus.com) for any available routes.

2. **Train Options:**
   - **Amtrak:** Visit the [Amtrak website](https://www.amtrak.com) and search for trains from San Jose to Portland. Amtrak's Coast Starlight route might be a good option.

You can visit these websites and enter your travel details to find the best options for your trip.

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions":"Find popular attractions in Portland for sightseeing and activities."}

chat_history.content:
Here are some popular attractions in Portland for sightseeing and activities:

1. **Washington Park**
   - Address: 4033 SW Canyon Rd, Portland, OR 97221, USA
   - Phone: (503) 319-0999
   - Website: [explorewashingtonpark.org](http://explorewashingtonpark.org/)

2. **Pittock Mansion**
   - Address: 3229 NW Pittock Dr, Portland, OR 97210, USA
   - Phone: (503) 823-3623
   - Website: [pittockmansion.org](http://pittockmansion.org/)

3. **Portland Art Museum**
   - Address: 1219 SW Park Ave, Portland, OR 97205, USA
   - Phone: (503) 226-2811
   - Website: [portlandartmuseum.org](https://portlandartmuseum.org/)

4. **Portland Japanese Garden**
   - Address: 611 SW Kingston Ave, Portland, OR 97205, USA
   - Phone: (503) 223-1321
   - Website: [japanesegarden.org](https://japanesegarden.org/)

5. **International Rose Test Garden**
   - Address: 400 SW Kingston Ave, Portland, OR 97205, USA
   - Phone: (503) 823-3636
   - Website: [portlandoregon.gov](https://www.portlandoregon.gov/parks/finder/index.cfm?action=viewpark&propertyid=1113)

6. **OMSI (Oregon Museum of Science and Industry)**
   - Address: 1945 SE Water Ave, Portland, OR 97214, USA
   - Phone: (503) 797-4000
   - Website: [omsi.edu](https://omsi.edu/)

7. **Haunted Underground Shanghai Tunnels Tour**
   - Address: 226 NW Davis St, Portland, OR 97209, USA
   - Phone: (503) 622-4798
   - Website: [portlandtunnels.com](http://www.portlandtunnels.com/)

8. **The Grotto**
   - Address: 8840 NE Skidmore St, Portland, OR 97220, USA
   - Phone: (503) 254-7371
   - Website: [thegrotto.org](http://www.thegrotto.org/)

9. **Lan Su Chinese Garden**
   - Address: 239 NW Everett St, Portland, OR 97209, USA
   - Phone: (503) 228-8131
   - Website: [lansugarden.org](https://lansugarden.org/)

10. **Oregon Zoo**
    - Address: 4001 SW Canyon Rd, Portland, OR 97221, USA
    - Phone: (503) 226-1561
    - Website: [oregonzoo.org](http://www.oregonzoo.org/?utm_source=google-gmb-maps&utm_medium=gmb-website-button&utm_campaign=locl.io&utm_content=093c59cc-81f8-430c-a54b-2f222231412d)

11. **Hoyt Arboretum**
    - Address: 4000 SW Fairview Blvd, Portland, OR 97221, USA
    - Phone: (503) 865-8733
    - Website: [hoytarboretum.org](http://www.hoytarboretum.org/)

12. **The Wishing Tree**
    - Address: 2954 NE 7th Ave, Portland, OR 97212, USA
    - Website: [Facebook Page](https://m.facebook.com/pages/The-Wishing-Tree/290167554473421)

13. **Forest Park**
    - Address: Portland, OR 97231, USA
    - Phone: (503) 823-4492
    - Website: [portlandoregon.gov](https://www.portlandoregon.gov/parks/finder/index.cfm?action=ViewPark&PropertyID=127)

14. **The Freakybuttrue Peculiarium and Museum**
    - Address: 2234 NW Thurman St, Portland, OR 97210, USA
    - Phone: (503) 227-3164
    - Website: [peculiarium.com](http://www.peculiarium.com/)

15. **Crystal Springs Rhododendron Garden**
    - Address: 5801 SE 28th Ave, Portland, OR 97202, USA
    - Phone: (503) 267-7509
    - Website: [crystalspringsgardenpdx.org](https://www.crystalspringsgardenpdx.org/)

16. **Oaks Amusement Park**
    - Address: 7805 SE Oaks Park Way, Portland, OR 97202, USA
    - Phone: (503) 233-5777
    - Website: [oakspark.com](http://oakspark.com/)

17. **Witch's Castle**
    - Address: Lower Macleay Trail, Portland, OR 97210, USA
    - Phone: (503) 823-4000
    - Website: [portlandoregon.gov](https://www.portlandoregon.gov/)

18. **Pittock Mansion Park Viewpoint**
    - Address: 3229 NW Pittock Dr, Portland, OR 97210, USA
    - Website: [portland.gov](https://www.portland.gov/parks/pittock-mansion)

19. **Mt Tabor Park**
    - Address: SE 60th Ave &, SE Salmon St, Portland, OR 97215, USA
    - Phone: (503) 823-7529
    - Website: [portland.gov](https://www.portland.gov/parks/mt-tabor-park)

20. **Oregon Historical Society**
    - Address: 1200 SW Park Ave, Portland, OR 97205, USA

These attractions offer a variety of experiences, from historical sites and museums to beautiful gardens and parks. Enjoy your time in Portland!

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").
current_city.title: Current City

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"
transportation.title: Transportation

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"
breakfast.title: Breakfast

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"
attraction.title: Attraction

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
accommodation.title: Accommodation

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City

chat_history.content:
Here are some popular restaurants in Portland that serve Mediterranean, French, Mexican, and Indian cuisines:

### Mediterranean

   - Rating: 3.8

   - Rating: 3.9

### French

### Indian

2. **Salad Days**
   - Average Cost: $41
   - Rating: 4.0

3. **Samavar - The Ashok**

   - Rating: 3.2

These restaurants offer a variety of cuisines and have varying ratings and average costs. Enjoy your dining experience in Portland!

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

chat_history.name: attraction_search

chat_history.content:
Here are some popular attractions in Portland for sightseeing and activities:

1. **Washington Park**
   - Address: 4033 SW Canyon Rd, Portland, OR 97221, USA
   - Phone: (503) 319-0999
   - Website: [explorewashingtonpark.org](http://explorewashingtonpark.org/)

2. **Pittock Mansion**
   - Address: 3229 NW Pittock Dr, Portland, OR 97210, USA
   - Phone: (503) 823-3623
   - Website: [pittockmansion.org](http://pittockmansion.org/)

3. **Portland Art Museum**
   - Address: 1219 SW Park Ave, Portland, OR 97205, USA
   - Phone: (503) 226-2811
   - Website: [portlandartmuseum.org](https://portlandartmuseum.org/)

4. **Portland Japanese Garden**
   - Address: 611 SW Kingston Ave, Portland, OR 97205, USA
   - Phone: (503) 223-1321
   - Website: [japanesegarden.org](https://japanesegarden.org/)

5. **International Rose Test Garden**
   - Address: 400 SW Kingston Ave, Portland, OR 97205, USA
   - Phone: (503) 823-3636
   - Website: [portlandoregon.gov](https://www.portlandoregon.gov/parks/finder/index.cfm?action=viewpark&propertyid=1113)

6. **OMSI (Oregon Museum of Science and Industry)**
   - Address: 1945 SE Water Ave, Portland, OR 97214, USA
   - Phone: (503) 797-4000
   - Website: [omsi.edu](https://omsi.edu/)

7. **Haunted Underground Shanghai Tunnels Tour**
   - Address: 226 NW Davis St, Portland, OR 97209, USA
   - Phone: (503) 622-4798
   - Website: [portlandtunnels.com](http://www.portlandtunnels.com/)

8. **The Grotto**
   - Address: 8840 NE Skidmore St, Portland, OR 97220, USA
   - Phone: (503) 254-7371
   - Website: [thegrotto.org](http://www.thegrotto.org/)

9. **Lan Su Chinese Garden**
   - Address: 239 NW Everett St, Portland, OR 97209, USA
   - Phone: (503) 228-8131
   - Website: [lansugarden.org](https://lansugarden.org/)

10. **Oregon Zoo**
    - Address: 4001 SW Canyon Rd, Portland, OR 97221, USA
    - Phone: (503) 226-1561
    - Website: [oregonzoo.org](http://www.oregonzoo.org/?utm_source=google-gmb-maps&utm_medium=gmb-website-button&utm_campaign=locl.io&utm_content=093c59cc-81f8-430c-a54b-2f222231412d)

11. **Hoyt Arboretum**
    - Address: 4000 SW Fairview Blvd, Portland, OR 97221, USA
    - Phone: (503) 865-8733
    - Website: [hoytarboretum.org](http://www.hoytarboretum.org/)

12. **The Wishing Tree**
    - Address: 2954 NE 7th Ave, Portland, OR 97212, USA
    - Website: [Facebook Page](https://m.facebook.com/pages/The-Wishing-Tree/290167554473421)

13. **Forest Park**
    - Address: Portland, OR 97231, USA
    - Phone: (503) 823-4492
    - Website: [portlandoregon.gov](https://www.portlandoregon.gov/parks/finder/index.cfm?action=ViewPark&PropertyID=127)

14. **The Freakybuttrue Peculiarium and Museum**
    - Address: 2234 NW Thurman St, Portland, OR 97210, USA
    - Phone: (503) 227-3164
    - Website: [peculiarium.com](http://www.peculiarium.com/)

15. **Crystal Springs Rhododendron Garden**
    - Address: 5801 SE 28th Ave, Portland, OR 97202, USA
    - Phone: (503) 267-7509
    - Website: [crystalspringsgardenpdx.org](https://www.crystalspringsgardenpdx.org/)

16. **Oaks Amusement Park**
    - Address: 7805 SE Oaks Park Way, Portland, OR 97202, USA
    - Phone: (503) 233-5777
    - Website: [oakspark.com](http://oakspark.com/)

17. **Witch's Castle**
    - Address: Lower Macleay Trail, Portland, OR 97210, USA
    - Phone: (503) 823-4000
    - Website: [portlandoregon.gov](https://www.portlandoregon.gov/)

18. **Pittock Mansion Park Viewpoint**
    - Address: 3229 NW Pittock Dr, Portland, OR 97210, USA
    - Website: [portland.gov](https://www.portland.gov/parks/pittock-mansion)

19. **Mt Tabor Park**
    - Address: SE 60th Ave &, SE Salmon St, Portland, OR 97215, USA
    - Phone: (503) 823-7529
    - Website: [portland.gov](https://www.portland.gov/parks/mt-tabor-park)

20. **Oregon Historical Society**
    - Address: 1200 SW Park Ave, Portland, OR 97205, USA
    - Phone: (503) 222-1741
    - Website: [ohs.org](http://www.ohs.org/)

These attractions offer a variety of experiences, from historical sites and museums to beautiful gardens and parks. Enjoy your time in Portland!
